articles.content: In context: Moveit, Progress Software's enterprise-level managed file transfer application has had a bad month. Only a few weeks ago, known Russian-linked threat actors and ransomware groups actively… [+2856 chars]

articles.title: 2 flights have close call at MSP Airport, FAA investigating - WCCO - CBS Minnesota
articles.description: The Federal Aviation Administration is investigating after a close call between two flights in the Twin Cities earlier this week.
